content: rat s ass & flying rat s ass theresa harmless jenkins i work as a night shift med/surg nurse on a gi floor patient acuity and ratios have been pushed lately i made these rat s asses and flying rat s asses so i would have one to give i i wrote this pattern you may make and sell items from this pattern you may not sell my pattern i am offering it for free you may however fold the pattern into a paper airplane and fly it this pattern is directions and tutorial it uses magic_ring single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet tc slip_stitch and is crocheted in the round materials -pink worsted weight sport weight or aran weight yarn -rat colored white brown gray cream black worsted weight sport weight or aran weight yarn -white cream or silver yarn for optional wings -g h or size 7 4 5 mm hook its your preference anus using the pink yarn and hook of your choice leaving a 6 inch tail make a slip knot harmless archer knits 2019 theresa harmless jenkins harmless archer@yahoo com making a magic_ring single_crochet 6 in slip knot join stitches with a slip_stitch ass change to rat colored yarn chain 2 half_double_crochet 2 in each stitch joining with a slip_stitch 12 chain 2 double_crochet 2 in 1st stitch double_crochet in next stitch continue to end 18 weave in rat colored yarn feet using pink yarn chain 1 single_crochet 2 st in one stitch on edge on right lower quadrant rlq skip 4 st on edge repeat for other foot llq harmless archer knits 2019 theresa harmless jenkins harmless archer@yahoo com tail poke pink yarn through pink stitches just above where magic_ring puckers chain 10 pull end through last chain ~ ~ optional wings with white cream wing colored yarn in right upper quadrant ruq chain 3 tc 3 times in stitch weave in ends repeat in left upper quadrant luq harmless archer knits 2019 theresa harmless jenkins harmless archer@yahoo com
